comments:
When starting Eclipse the favorites menus for run and debug remain
empty, although the 'display in favorites menu: run' rsp. debug option
is selected. This may be an aftereffect of bug #17937, but there is no error 
message and no way to fix the launcher configuration.
The error log contains the following error message:

We were not persisting launch history in UTF8 format. I'm hoping this will fix 
this problem - please retest with build F2 or 20020530 (tomorrow's integration 
build).
I think that the fix to bug# 18222 will fix this problem.

Marking as duplicate. If this problem is present in F2 builds, please re-open 
or file a new bug.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18222 ***
